attributes.comment:
It it simply outrageous that you are planning to increase fees for a services that is
so inneficient, unreliable and deffective, as Immigration Services are, at least for
us, the legal and non-rich immigrants.
Anybody coming illegaly here get better treatment than we people who does
everything by the book : YOUR BOOK, which recommendations are not follow
properly by your own staff, at all.
My daughter has been 2 years waiting for a replacement of her Green Card that
was issued with an error by your institution.
So far, we have provided everything requiered, and received nothing.
Thanks for nothing, and also for wanting to charge us even more, for nothing.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Maria E. Gil
